data.title: Serrurerie du léman Sàrl
data.meta_description: Here you will find all the news and information about Serrurerie du Léman Sàrl.
data.meta_site_name: Serrurerie du léman Sàrl - We offer, advise, plan, maintain and support our customers in the following areas Physical protection of people and property, lift and slide windows, locker systems and cloakroom equipment.
data.text:
New lockers for the SBB in Montreux

The Swiss Federal Railways SBB FFS and the company INTECH-ICS AG have been working for years on new locker facilities for public transport customers. The latest locker system is now located at the Montreux train station, where the...

New installation of lockers at the TPF station in Bulle

On 14.06.2022, the Transports publics fribourgeois Holding (TPF) SA had the pleasure of taking possession of the new locker at Bulle station. Customers can now deposit their luggage - whether small or large bags - in the new locker.

New locker installation at Freiburg station

SBB FFS and INTECH-ICS AG (partner company of Serrurerie du Léman Sàrl) have been working for years on new locker installations for customers. The latest locker installation is now located at the railway station in...

New at Serrurerie du Léman Sàrl: Hammerglass

Serrurerie du Léman Sàrl, in collaboration with INTECH-ICS AG, distributes Hammerglass AB safety glass in French-speaking Switzerland. Hammerglass is the new generation of unbreakable polycarbonate glass with a nanometric surface treatment....
